titles.title: To direct the Administrator of General Services to convey to Fresno County, California, the existing Federal courthouse in that county.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.

bill.summary: 10/10/2002--Introduced. Directs the Administrator of General Services to convey to Fresno County, California, the existing Federal courthouse in that county upon completion a new Federal courthouse in Fresno.
